featured.text: This article about fantasy literature is intended to __________.
People enter the world of fantasy for the following reasons EXCEPT that __________.
That is why, every once in a while, we like to escape into the world of fantasy—a place where things always go our way and there is always a happy ending.

definition.zh_def: 幻想，虛構的事物或情境，通常與魔法或超自然元素有關。
definition.en_def: A genre of imaginative fiction involving magical elements, often set in imaginary worlds.
definition.example: The book is a fantasy novel filled with dragons and wizards.
